org.lemming.outputs

Class GaussRenderOutput

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lemming.outputs.SingleInput<Localization>
      • org.lemming.outputs.GaussRenderOutput
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, Rendering, Well<Localization>

    public class GaussRenderOutput
extends SingleInput<Localization>
implements Rendering
    Renders the localizations received in the input using Gaussians. The display is updated asynchronously at regular intervals (100 ms).
    Author:
    Joe Borbely

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GaussRenderOutput()
      Draw an image from a Store of molecule localizations and render each molecule as a 2-dimensional Gaussian.

      Draw an image from a Store of molecule localizations and render each molecule as a 2-dimensional Gaussian.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GaussRenderOutput

        public GaussRenderOutput()
        Draw an image from a Store of molecule localizations and render each molecule as a 2-dimensional Gaussian. This construct uses default variables for the image width and height, for the Gaussian parameters and for the image title.
        See Also:
        GaussRenderOutput(width, height), GaussRenderOutput(width, height, area, background, aspectRatio, sigmaX, theta, title)

      • GaussRenderOutput

        public GaussRenderOutput(int width,
                         int height)
        Draw an image from a Store of molecule localizations and render each molecule as a 2-dimensional Gaussian. This construct uses default values for the Gaussian parameters and for the image title.
        Parameters:
        width - - the image width, in pixels (e.g. 256)
        height - - the image height, in pixels (e.g. 256)
        See Also:
        GaussRenderOutput()

      • GaussRenderOutput

        public GaussRenderOutput(int width,
                         int height,
                         double area,
                         double background,
                         double aspectRatio,
                         double sigmaX,
                         double theta,
                         java.lang.String title)
        Draw an image from a Store of molecule localizations and render each molecule as a 2-dimensional Gaussian.
        Parameters:
        width - - the image width, in pixels (e.g. 256)
        height - - the image height, in pixels (e.g. 256)
        area - - the area (total intensity) of a normalized, Gaussian function
        background - - the background signal
        aspectRatio - - the aspect ratio, i.e., sigmaY/sigmaX
        sigmaX - - the Gaussian sigma value in the x-direction
        theta - - the rotation angle, in radians, between the fluorescing molecule and the image canvas
        title - - the title to display in the image Window
        See Also:
        GaussRenderOutput(), GaussRenderOutput(int, int)

    • Method Detail

      • setGaussianParameters

        public void setGaussianParameters(double area,
                                  double background,
                                  double aspectRatio,
                                  double sigmaX,
                                  double theta)
        Set the parameters for the normalized, 2-dimensional, Gaussian function that is used to render a molecule.
        Parameters:
        area - - the area (total intensity) of a normalized, Gaussian function
        background - - the background signal
        aspectRatio - - the aspect ratio, i.e., sigmaY/sigmaX
        sigmaX - - the Gaussian sigma value in the x-direction
        theta - - the rotation angle, in radians, between the fluorescing molecule and the image canvas

      • setTitle

        public void setTitle(java.lang.String title)
        Set the image title to display on Titlebar of the image Window.
        Parameters:
        title - - the image title
